mapper.sql: id, name, flag, sort, layer, url, type, parent_id, is_show,updator,update_time,creator,create_time, ext1, ext2,ext3, status
mapper.select: select p.* from sys_power p where p.id > 0 and p.parent_id=-1 and p.status = 1 and exists (select 1 from sys_role_power rp, sys_account_role ar,sys_account su where ar.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.power_id = p.id and su.id=ar.account_id and ar.account_id = #{value} and rp.status = 1 and ar.status = 1 and su.status=1 )

SELECT a.* FROM sys_power a INNER JOIN sys_role_power b ON a.id = b.power_id INNER JOIN sys_account_role c ON b.role_id = c.role_id WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.is_show = 0 AND b.`status` = 1 AND c.`status` = 1 AND c.account_id = #{value}
SELECT * FROM sys_power p INNER JOIN sys_role_power rp ON p.id = rp.power_id WHERE p. STATUS = 1 AND rp.role_id = #{value}
select id from sys_power where parent_id=#{parentId} order by id desc limit 0,1
